title: Understanding the LOBSTAMONKEE Manifold
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Event

I have assembled this curation of Rumblings from Thunder Bay and Levin on Lex to explain to people with large vocabularies why they should play show & tell with clips with us on the discord. Clipped from the Weekday Livestream on the Grizwald Grim YouTube channel, October 10, 2022.

Main Course:  /watch?v=jhHcwG9guYk
Thunder Bay Rumbling on PVK:  /watch?v=yG1-8Bo7No8
Levin on Lex:  /watch?v=p3lsYlod5OU

Add a Mudhut Illustration to your Christmas List:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

Check out the Channel's Community Tab!
Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/

Here's where you can get the lobstamonkee on stuff:
T-shirt: (accepting vendor pitches)
Cup:
